By default the media server doesn't remo: By verstek, verwyder die media bediener nie inligting van die media onmiddelik nie. Dit help wanneer 'n skyfaandrywer tydelik onkoppel is. Wanneer die asblik vir 'n afdeling leeggemaak word, word al die inligting van vermiste media geskrap.

Plex was unable to authenticate your ser: Plex was unable to authenticate your server. Please sign your server out and try again.
Your server was unable to reach Plex. Pl: Your server was unable to reach Plex. Please ensure that the computer or device running your server can access the internet.
You have successfully signed your server: You have successfully signed your server in to Plex, but we were unable to reach it from outside your network.
If you skip this step you will not be ab: If you skip this step you will not be able to share or stream media outside your home. If you change your mind later, you can adjust this in Settings.
If you would like to enable this now, yo: If you would like to enable this now, you will need to configure your router or firewall to allow Plex to contact your server. Please refer to our {1}Connecting a Server{2} article for more information.
Select which additional agents should co: Kies watter addisionele agente moet bydra tot die metadata van {1}, en sleep hulle die volgorde van voorkeur te verander.
Connecting your server to Plex allows yo: Connecting your server to Plex allows you to stream media outside your home network.
Enable this if automatic mapping fails. You will need to configure your router. Detailed instructions are available {1}here{2}.
Sets the allowed networks setting to 127: Sets the allowed networks setting to 127.0.0.1/255.255.255.255. This requires other computers on a local network to authenticate before accessing the server.
Settings are restricted from shared user: Settings are restricted from shared users.
Help us translate Plex/Web into your lan: Help ons {1}hier{2} om Plex/Web in u taal te vertaal.
Automatically play theme music in the ba: Speel outamies die temaliedjie in die agtergrond wanneer dit beskikbaar is.
Show unwatched icons in list items.
Press ? to view the list of {1}available: Druk ? om die lys van {1}beskikbare kortpaaie{2} te sien.
You can view the debug logs {1}here{2}.
Refresh after saving this setting for it: Refresh after saving this setting for it to take effect.
Drag the items below to reorder your das: Drag the items below to reorder your dashboard content.
Allow searching libraries that have been: Allow searching libraries that have been shared with you.
Allow searching channels that have enabl: Allow searching channels that have enabled search.
Use the experimental video player, which: Use the experimental video player, which supports streaming to the HTML5 video element instead of the Flash player. Requires Plex Media Server 0.9.8.6 or later.
Allows the player to play compatible med: Allows the player to play compatible media without any conversion. In most browsers, direct play supports MP4 videos with h264 video and AAC audio. Videos with subtitles cannot be played directly.
Allows the server to copy compatible aud: Allows the server to copy compatible audio and video streams without converting them.
When multiple resolutions are available: When multiple resolutions are available for a video, automatically use the best resolution below the maximum quality.
Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio: Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio
Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be pl: Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be played directly. Browser support for AC3 audio is limited.
Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding aud: Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding audio. Some devices, like the Wii U, only support HLS with AAC audio.
Let's start by giving your Plex Media Se: Kom ons val weg deur u Plex Mediabediener ’n vriendelike naam te gee sodat ander rekenaars op die netwerk dit kan identifiseer. Indien u dit ooplos sal u rekenaarnaam gebruik word.
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: Stel u belang om ons te help om Plex beter te maak vir almal? Ons versamel anonieme data, wat ons gebruik om die diens oor tyd mee te verbeter.
Plex channels give you access to online: Plex kanaale gee jou toe laating na webwerf media van verskillende sites. Jy kan blaai en installeer die kanaale van die Kanaal Gids, maar begin by installeering van verskyn kenaale.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this very moment, Plex is working tirelessly to build your library, and make it look beautiful.
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Feel free to watch Plex work, or take this opportunity to {1}download{2} some Plex apps!
We really appreciate it. See what {1}ben: We really appreciate it. See what {1}benefits{2} come with your subscription.
Go Premium. Get a Plex Pass.
Opstelling vir gedeelde bedieners word nie toegelaat nie.
A problem has been detected with a core: ’n Probleem met ’n kernkomponent van Plex Mediabediener is ervaar.
Please visit the {1}forums{2} and provid: Besoek asb. die {1}forums{2} en verskaf u aantekeninge soos {3}hier{4} beskryf.
Sign in with a Plex account to help your: Sign in with a Plex account to help your devices find each other, access your media from anywhere, and queue up videos from your browser to watch later in Plex.
Plex organizes your media into libraries: Plex organiseer u media in biblioteke. U kan soveel biblioteke toevoeg soos u wil en u kan veelvuldige biblioteke met dieselfde mediatipe hê.
To save a video to your queue, click “❯: To save a video to your queue, click “❯ Plex It!” in your Bookmarks Bar so you can watch it later.
A panel will appear on the left side of: A panel will appear on the left side of the page to let you know the video has been saved.
You can also recommend the video to frie: You can also recommend the video to friends or “fling” it to a Plex player and watch it there.
Send an email to the address above with: Send an email to the address above with any link(s) you want added to your queue.
Add this to your address book so you can: Add this to your address book so you can easily email links from your iPhone, iPad, Android, or any other device.
Plex was unable to authenticate your ser: Plex was unable to authenticate your server. Please sign out and try again.
Plex was unable to connect to your serve: Plex was unable to connect to your server. Please ensure that the computer or device with your server can be reached from outside your home network.
Plex is currently not responding. Please: Plex is currently not responding. Please try again in a few minutes.
Plex was unable to connect to your serve: Plex was unable to connect to your server. Please ensure that the computer or device with your server can access the internet.
You will not be able to stream media fro: U sal nie die media kan stroom van buite u tuis netwerk nie totdat dit opgelos is nie.
Please refer to the {1}Connecting a Serv: Please refer to the {1}Connecting a Server{2} FAQ for more information.
Connecting your server to Plex allows yo: Connecting your server to Plex allows you to stream media outside your home network, and can help your devices find each other.

Mind the construction. Parked cars may b: Mind the construction. Parked cars may be towed.

Grab a tea, and we will be back online s: Maak solank tee. Ons is binnekort weer aanlyn.

This name will be used to identify this: This name will be used to identify this media server to other computers on your network. If you leave it blank, your computer's name will be used instead.

This helps us improve your experience (f: This helps us improve your experience (for example, to help us match movies and TV shows).
Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging: Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging
Ask to add a login item for externally m: Ask to add a login item for externally mounted drives

Your library will be updated automatical: Your library will be updated automatically when changes to library folders are detected

Empty trash automatically after every sc: Empty trash automatically after every scan
Include music sections in automatic upda: Include music sections in automatic updates
Large music sections may take a long tim: Large music sections may take a long time to scan
Number of seconds to wait before a plugi: Number of seconds to wait before a plugin times out
Capability checking ensures that plug-in: Capability checking ensures that plug-ins that are incompatible with this version of the server or the current client application you are using are hidden. Disabling capability checking is useful during development, but will enable access to plug-ins that may perform unreliably with certain client applications.
List of networks that are allowed withou: List of networks that are allowed without auth
Comma separated list of ip/netmask for n: Comma separated list of ip/netmask for networks that are allowed into PMS without auth
Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes: Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes wait for the transcoder to begin writing data
Duration in minutes to use when transcod: Duration in minutes to use when transcoding something with an unknown duration
Directory to use when transcoding for te: Directory to use when transcoding for temporary files
Amount in seconds to buffer before throt: Amount in seconds to buffer before throttling the transcoder
Show the WebKit window used by plugins i: Show the WebKit window used by plugins instead of placing it off screen
Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS aud: Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS audio.
Media Link does not support DTS audio in: Media Link does not support DTS audio in certain regions. The Plex Media Server can automatically convert DTS to stereo so that it will play.
Automatically select audio tracks in you: Automatically select audio tracks in your preferred language when possible.
Client-specific configuration settings f: Client-specific configuration settings for the DLNA server
Protocol info string used in GetProtocol: Protocol info string used in GetProtocolInfo responses by the DLNA server
Number of seconds between DLNA media ren: Number of seconds between DLNA media renderer discovery requests
Enable the PMS DLNA server to report tim: Enable the PMS DLNA server to report timelines for video play activity
